newsitem.title: USA: Storage Trust files $150 mln shelf offer.
newsitem.headline: Storage Trust files $150 mln shelf offer.

text.p: Storage Trust Realty filed Friday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to $150 million in common shares and warrants to buy common shares.
The Columbia, Mo.,-based real estate investment trust said the amount includes $6.165 million of the securities remaining unsold from a previous registration.

The company said net proceeds will be used to fund the acquisition and development of self-storage facilities as suitable opportunities arise, to repay outstanding debt and for general corporate purposes.
